login.welcome: Welcome to the Livementor front technical test
login.default: Please create an account or login

home.description: The test is simple, you just need to create a messaging system that will allow two people to communicate. Depending on the level of difficulty you will have to achieve more or less. We provide within this project the connection to the database. It is a firebase database, the identifiers are already entered. The firebase and vuexfire module are already installed.
